question: Which of the following refers to Rajasuya?
option1: It was a royal consecration and conferred supreme power on the king
option2: It was a chariot race in which royal chariot was made to win against all kinsmen
option3: It meant unquestioned control over an area in which the royal horse ran uninterrupted
answer: It was a royal consecration and conferred supreme power on the king
explanation: During the later vedic times the Kings's rule was strengthened by ritual enactments such as the Rajasuya. Rajasuya was a royal consecration and conferred supreme power on the king.
